name: Daytime Cat
description:
A game about a unique cat that does not sleep by daylight.

Thank you for playing! Please leave feedback! > <

Sadly it does not have audio, which deeply hurts the creator's heart as a composer, not being able to tackle the challenge of creating everything within 3 hours with only a trackpad.

Source repo: https://github.com/kawa-yoiko/Daytime-Cat

Change log

  • 19 Jan, 08:30 UTC: Revised introduction to the hint.
  • 18 Jan, 18:00 UTC: Difficulty has been rebalanced.
